concept.title: Resolve map references (mapref)
concept.shortdesc: The mapref step resolves references from one DITA map to another. This step is implemented in XSLT.

section.p: Maps reference other maps by using the following sorts of markup: <topicref href="other.ditamap" format="ditamap"/> ... <mapref href="other.ditamap"/>

As a result of the mapref step, the element that references another map is replaced by the topic references from the other map. Relationship tables are pulled into the referencing map as a child of the root element (map or a specialization of map).
